entry.title: About me
entry.summary:
Postdoc at the KRDB Research Centre for Knowledge and Data, Faculty of Computer Science, Free University of Bozen-Bolzano, Italy.

My research focuses on Ontology-Based Data Access (OBDA) and related topics such as query optimization and integration of non-relational data sources. I am part of team that develops the OBDA system Ontop.

Recent publications

  • Ontop: Answering SPARQL Queries over Relational Databases. Diego Calvanese, Benjamin Cogrel, Sarah Komla-Ebri, Roman Kontchakov, Davide Lanti, Martin Rezk, Mariano Rodriguez-Muro, and Guohui Xiao. Semantic Web Journal, 2016. (SWJ 2016 Outstanding Paper Award)
  • OBDA Beyond Relational DBs: A Study for MongoDB. Elena Botoeva, Diego Calvanese, Benjamin Cogrel, Martin Rezk, Guohui Xiao. Description Logics, 2016.
  • A Formal Presentation of MongoDB (Extended Version). Elena Botoeva, Diego Calvanese, Benjamin Cogrel, Martin Rezk, Guohui Xiao. CoRR abs/1603.09291, 2016.

DBLP

Recent talks

  • Ontology-Based Data Access with Ontop. Last lecture of the course Query Answering with Description Logic Ontologies, ESSLLI summer school, August 26, 2016. Bolzano, Italy.
  • Introduction to the Ontop framework. Geospatial, Mathematical and Linked Big Data Workshop, European Data Forum, June 28, 2016. Eindhoven, The Netherlands.
  • OBDA with Ontop. Erasmus Mundus Master Programme IT4BI, April 22, 2016. Blois, France.
  • Accès aux données suivant le principe OBDA avec Ontop. Journées «Ontologies en Sciences Humaines et Sociales», November 9, 2016. Tours, France.
  • Interroger efficacement des bases de données relationnelles avec SPARQL et Ontop. SemWeb.Pro, 5 November, 2015. Paris, France.
